answers.answer: All I know is that my bestfrienf Gd stay with her now she on insulin when she pregnant n on pill when she's not. it started with her first child. Everyone is different bc her family has history with D.
even my father is a diabetic patient for past 20 years and now on insulin for past 3 years.so dr told me i may get diabetes in future but i didnt expect this much soon
My mother developed GD with me, but it went away after I was born. 6 years later she developed it again with my sister, and developed regular diabetes after that. She's had it for 22 years now.

question: hi i had gestational diabetes(average 156) when i was pregnant with twins. after delivery my doc tested and it was normal for 4 days then i came home and doctor asked me to take Glucose tolerance test with 75mg glucose loaded on empty stomach ahter 6 weeks of csec delivery. it is showing    fasting - 103, 1hour - 175, 2hours - 182. is this means i have diabetes? wat i should do?
title: can gestational diabetes cause diabetes?anybody had GDM turns to diabetes after delivery?
